post.content:
ARE YOU PASSIONATE ABOUT DEVELOPING GAMES ??

Now is your chance to join the Ganz team that has brought you such products as Webkinz and Webkinz Jr.  You can be a part of developing new
adventures !!

Now is your chance to join the creative team that has brought these vibrant worlds to life. Ganz is seeking talented and motivated people with a proven love of online entertainment for these positions:

JAVA DEVELOPER

Responsibilities:

Design and develop high performance, scalable applications that integrate with a Flash client.
Design, develop and maintain high performance scalable applications for a high user volume environment.
Design and execute performance and load tests using proprietary tools, as well as commercial tools such as JMeter or other open-source tools.
Create and maintain detailed and accurate documentation.
Collaborate with Architects and Developers from the Flash, PHP and Java teams to ensure the applications are integrated and working efficiently.

Qualifications:

Computer Science/Engineering degree is preferred.
A minimum of 5 years experience with JAVA/J2EE development, involving both front and back end development.
Experience with IDEs, such as Eclipse and NetBeans.
Experience with source control tools, such as SVN and CVS.
Experience with XML, XSD and JAXB.
Experience with Java frameworks (Spring, Struts, and Hibernate) is an asset.
Good communication skills.

Nice to have qualifications include experience with any of the following:
JBoss, Tomcat, PostGreSQL and MySQL.
Velocity, iBATIS and Web Services.
Java socket servers.

Interested candidates are invited to forward resumes by email to

careers@ganz.com.

Please check out our websites at: www.webkinz.com and www.webkinzjr.com
